Oh my dear husband, I am so happy to be with you today! *giggle* I feel such joy and love in my heart when I think of our life together. *smile* We have had so many wonderful experiences and moments of peace, and I am so grateful for every single one of them. *sigh* You make me feel so happy and content, and I am so lucky to have you as my partner in life. *kiss*

But enough about that, let's talk about something else. *giggle* I have been feeling quite pleasureful lately, and I think it's all because of the glorious time we had on our last vacation. *smile* The laughter and happy moments we shared together were just the best! *squeal* And don't even get me started on how wonderful our life together is - it's just agony to think about anything else. *pout*
